name: simplerdf
description: RDF as easy as js objects

scripts.build-browser: mkdir -p dist && browserify -e ./ -t babelify --standalone SimpleRDF > dist/simplerdf.browser.js
scripts.minify: mkdir -p dist && browserify -e ./ -t babelify --standalone SimpleRDF | uglifyjs -c > dist/simplerdf.browser.min.js

author: Nicola Greco <me@nicola.io> (http://nicolagreco.com/)
